trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element that defines auditing-related configuration settings for a behavior.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个配置元素，定义行为的审核相关的配置设置。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceSecurityAuditElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceSecurityAuditElement"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the audit log.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置审核日志的位置。

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation"></xref> value that specifies the location of the audit log.
trans-unit.target: 一个有效<xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation"></xref>值，该值指定审核日志的位置。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of this behavior configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 获取此行为配置元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the behavior.
trans-unit.target: 行为的类型。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of the specified configuration element to this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceSecurityAuditElement"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的配置元素的内容复制到此<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceSecurityAuditElement"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceModelExtensionElement"></xref> that represents the configuration element to copy.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceModelExtensionElement"> </xref> ，表示要复制的配置元素。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of message authentication level that is used to log audit events.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于记录审核事件的消息身份验证级别的类型。

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"></xref> value that specifies the type of message authentication level that is used to log audit events.
trans-unit.target: 一个有效<xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"></xref>值，该值指定用于记录审核事件的消息身份验证级别的类型。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the types of authorization events that are recorded in the audit log.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置审核日志中记录的授权事件的类型。

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"></xref> value that specifies the type of authorization events that are recorded in the audit log.
trans-unit.target: 一个有效<xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"></xref>值，该值指定审核日志中记录的授权事件的类型。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies the behavior for suppressing failures of writing to the audit log.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，指定用于取消对审核日志的写入错误的行为。

trans-unit.source: Applications should be notified for failures of writing to the audit log.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序应将对审核日志的写入错误通知。

trans-unit.source: If your application is not designed to handle audit failures, you should use this property to suppress failures in writing to the audit log.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序未设计为处理审核错误，应使用此属性来禁止显示审核日志写入失败。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if exceptions other than <xref:System.OutOfMemoryException>, <xref href="System.StackOverflowException"></xref>, <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadAbortException"></xref>, and <xref:System.ArgumentException> that result from attempts to write audit events are handled by the system, and are not propagated to the application; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if all exceptions that result from attempts to write audit events are passed up to the application.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.OutOfMemoryException>，而导致的异常<xref href="System.StackOverflowException"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadAbortException"> </xref>，和<xref:System.ArgumentException>结果因尝试写入审核事件由系统进行处理且不传播到该应用程序;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果因尝试写入审核事件的所有异常都向上都传递给应用程序。</xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.OutOfMemoryException>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
